ⲕⲟⲧⲥ , ⲧⲟⲧⲥ , ⲧⲟϫⲥ seat, chair; (mod) f. sofa; m. a thing firmly fixed;

𓊨 qursi كرسي chair Stuhl стол kurseat
𓊨 qari stand 𓊢𓊾
𓊨 qur Stätte

𒁈 BÁRA preike(stuhl) 𒉺𒊩𒆠 pa-rak-ki preachers-throne-dais > Baal

𓀻 𓀻 𓀼 𓁖 seat stuhl 󳃈 󳃉 󳃊 󳃋 󳃌 󳃍 󳃎 󳃏 󳃐 󳃑 󳃒 󳃓 󳃔 󳃕 󳃖 cinnamon

𓊪 𓌈 𓆓 𓅱 | chair | ⋍podest

𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓊩 | high throne | throyt throne@Troy ( 𓈎 TAR ⋍ QAR 𓏘 )
𓏘 QAR ⋍ 𓈎 TAR
𒆪 KUR ≠ 𒂉 DUR ⚠️
𓈍 crown 𓎝 ≠ throne 𒄑𒆪 tânj tâj taç تاج tag tiara

𒄑𒄖𒍝 ᴳᴵˢ GU.ZA “throne”
𒄑𒄖𒍝 ᴳᴵˢ GU.ZA kussī chaisseˡ chairs
𒄑𒄖𒍝 ᴳᴵˢ GU.ZA kussī kursəyā כורסיא कुर्सी kursī كُرْسِيّ καρέκλα karékla
𒄑𒄖𒍝 ᴳᴵˢ GU.ZA kussī كُرْسِيّ kursiyy kyrios 𓋞 kakkīya 𒄑𒄖𒍝 kussī
𒀀𒄖 KURᵒⁿ “crown” 𓈍

ⲑⲣⲟⲛⲟⲥ 🇬🇷 m. seat, chair, throne, chair of state ⇔ kurion krönig

𒐼𒋗 ŠA-ŠU Sessel "furniture"

ⲧⲟⲧⲥ m (tots) totze ha eareth phruit

椅子 (zh) (yǐzi) hin-sit

𓊪 𓌈 𓆓 𓅱 chair ⋍podest

Arabic ثور (t̠wr) : Hebrew שור (šwr) with Sanskrit स्थूर (stʰūra) : Avestan 𐬯𐬙𐬀𐬊𐬭𐬀 (staora) [Bull, Ox]. • Arabic ثأر (ṯʾar) [Revenge] has a probable cognate with Sanskrit स्थार (stʰāra) (Archaic स्थाल (stʰāla)) (Taking a Stand) traditionally traced to the same root as स्थूर ; ष्ठा [to stand].

Somali: kursi cagaha (footstool)
